alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 09 at 3:02PM EDT until September 10 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Coastal flood advisory in effect for minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson and Coastal Wakulla Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM EDT Saturday. Peak water levels are expected around the time of high tide, which is 3 am Saturday and 3 pm Saturday. * IMPACTS...Peak water levels of 2 to 3 feet above ground level are expected around the time of high tide. This will result in flooding of Bottoms Road in Panacea and the end of Mashes Sands Beach Road. Old Fort Road in St Marks will also be prone to flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
